fields.desc: Elegant tasting is on call at this family-owned and operated winery. A local favorite in beautiful Santa Rosa with private tours of wine caves available.
fields.grapes: Cabernet Sauvignon,Merlot,Cabernet Franc,Red Wine Blends,Unique Reds,Rosé,

fields.grapes: Cabernet Sauvignon,Merlot,Syrah,Cabernet Franc,Petite Verdot,Malbec,Pinot Noir,Unique Reds,Chardonnay,Viognier,Unique White Wines,

fields.grapes: Cabernet Sauvignon,Merlot,Syrah,Malbec,Pinot Noir,Red Wine Blends,Unique Reds,Chardonnay,Viognier,Dessert Wines,Riesling,Sparkling Wines,White Wine Blends,Unique White Wines,

fields.name: Deux Amis Winery

fields.grapes: Cabernet Sauvignon,Syrah,Red Wine Blends,Sauvignon Blanc,White Wine Blends,

fields.grapes: Cabernet Sauvignon,Merlot,Zinfandel,Cabernet Franc,Other,Pinot Noir,Red Wine Blends,Chardonnay,Rosé,White Wine Blends,
